content: चैतन्यं [चेतनस्य भानः ष्यञ्] {@--1@} Spirit, life, intelligence, vitality, sensation. {@--2@} Soul, spirit, mind; <ls>U. 1. 36.</ls> {@--3@} Consciousness, feeling, sensation, sense; <ls>U. 1. 48.</ls> {@--4@} (In Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>) The supreme spirit considered as the essence of all being and source of all sensation. --न्यः <ab>N.</ab> of a modern reformer of the Vaiṣṇava faith.
